code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BookCard=_ref=>{let{book}=_ref;const isAvailable=book.available>0;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"book-title",children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"book-author",children:["by ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"book-isbn",children:["ISBN: ",book.isbn]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"book-availability",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"availability-badge ".concat(isAvailable?'availability-available':'availability-unavailable'),children:isAvailable?"".concat(book.available," available"):'Unavailable'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"book-quantity",children:[book.quantity," total copies"]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"book-actions",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/book/".concat(book._id),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"View Details"})})]});};export default BookCard;
